name: Yet another Brick Breaker
description:
A game where you destroy bricks in order to pass levels.  There are only 6 levels currently.

Also, there is no progress saving yet!
Works with mobile and PC. I recommend you use Chrome on mobile as it doesn’t work on Safari.

Controls:

ActionInput PCInput MobileStart/Spawn ballRight Click (Mouse 1)One finger tap on the screenMove boardMove the mouse aroundMove your finger around
